This app requires camera access to capture your workout

This app requires access to Health data to sync your workouts and activities

LaunchScreen
Main

This app requires access to your photo library to upload profile pictures and workout images.
This app needs to track your activity across other companies' apps and websites to provide you with a personalized fitness experience.
This app requires camera access to take profile pictures and workout progress photos.
This app requires your location to track outdoor workouts and activities.
This app requires background location access to track your outdoor fitness activities even when the app is not in use.
This app requires motion and fitness data to count steps and detect workout activities.
This app requires the ability to update health data to sync your workout activities.
This app requires the ability to access health data to provide personalized fitness recommendations.
This app requires calendar access to schedule and remind you of workout sessions.
This app requires Bluetooth to connect with fitness devices and wearables.
This app requires Bluetooth to connect with fitness devices and wearables.
This app requires access to your music library to allow you to play music during workouts.
